text: wakemela, “Amweye wamale wa Isiraeli, mtwapfile! Hayuno iyo imunu iyakwanga chila hanu, na kuwalangulitsa iwanu wose waleke kuwawinza Waisiraeli na ghamalaghitso gha Musa na hanu hano hanoghile. Kuya kawaghala iwanu iwali si Wayahudi mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, na kuhahinya hanu hano hahenzeluke.”
